name: JumbleBoard
description:
The game board is a 4x4 grid that contains 1, 2, 3, or 4 blank spaces (depending on the selected difficulty). The hardest difficulty creates a grid with 1 blank space; the easiest difficulty produces a grid that has 4 blank spaces... 

To win, the player will have to find and create the keyword. The letters of the keyword will be presented on a pale-yellow "AlphaPaper". 

To move a paper, the player must select a paper they want to move by clicking it once and then clicking a blank space that is in the space next to the selected paper.

Papers can't move diagonally, all words that are created have to be spelt left to right or top to bottom; otherwise, it won't work.
